SEARCH
Module org.microbean.bean
Package org.microbean.bean

Interface AbstractInstantiator.PositionalCreationBiFunction

Enclosing class:
AbstractInstantiator<R,I>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static interface AbstractInstantiator.PositionalCreationBiFunction
A functional interface that returns a suitable Creation given a zero-based position (such as that of a method or constructor parameter).
See Also:
  • apply(Creation, int)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Creation<?>
    apply(Creation<?> c, int p)
    Returns a (possibly null) Creation, which might be the supplied Creation, suitable for the supplied, zero-based position (such as that of a method or constructor parameter).

  • Method Details

    • apply

      Creation<?> apply(Creation<?> c, int p)
      Returns a (possibly null) Creation, which might be the supplied Creation, suitable for the supplied, zero-based position (such as that of a method or constructor parameter).

      Implementations of this method may return null.

      Parameters:
      c - a Creation; may be null
      p - a zero-based position (such as that of a method or constructor parameter); must not be negative
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if p is negative
